reference.title: CMM support for show command to display 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN (Feature f13406-01): feature summary
reference.shortdesc: This feature introduces a new show command on the CMM that displays 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN. The input parameters include the PLMN and the radio access type. The output is the PLMN, the RAT type and the IMSIs. This feature is supported for the 2G/3G/4G/5G.

table.title: CMM support for show command to display 20 representative IMSIs for an input PLMN: feature summary
